Summary: 2 large orange orbs trailing across the horizon N to S
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw the first large orange orb at approx 10pm. Initially couldnt identify as meteor? Or what? Watched it cross the horizon at abt airline cruising altitude from Northern most horizon to Southern most horizon. As the 4 adults discussed it for 5 minutes, we then noticed a second large orange orb following the exact same trajectory from N to S. very obviously not a plane, comet, meteor, helicopter, etc. No sound, no trails, moving very distinctly along the same paths.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Nolensville
This sighting has never been favorited.
